quotes.quote: When in doubt, always choose love and gratitude.
In a choice between love and fear, choose love.
Choose love not in the shallows but in the deep.
We do not choose love. It claims each man as it will.

Remember that you don't choose love; love chooses you. All you really can do is accept it for all its mystery when it comes into your life. Feel the way it fills you to overflowing then reach out and give it away.
Balance is only meaningful when we choose Love as the center of gravity!
Choose love and don't ever let fear turn you away from your playful heart.
Choose love and joy as much as you can in each moment and watch your life transform.
The hardest times to choose love become the very times that you can most grow spiritually.
There is abundant testimony that if we choose love rather than self, we gain immeasurably.
Live with an open mind and an open heart. Always choose love over fear and kindness over cruelty.
You have to choose love. In the most difficult of time to shift the paradigm to that which is love.
There is no fear when you choose love. The more you choose love, the more love is in your life. It gets easier and easier.
The only things that last are love and hate. The only one that matters is love: Choose love. Hate erodes. Love nourishes.
The way we can allow ourselves to do what we need to, no matter what others may say or do, is to choose love and defy fear.
If you do not know what you feel, then it is difficult to choose love; it is better to fall. Then you do not have to be responsible for your actions.
If one day you have to choose between the world and love, remember this: If you choose the world you’ll be left without love, but if you choose love, with it you will conquer the world

Those who choose love – daring to feel to the depths of being, accepting responsibility for their actions, and seeking a purpose in life – will find that the world of significant living will unfold its cleverly concealed presence.

All your life, you will be faced with a choice. You can choose love positivity and gratitude that things aren't worse or hate negativity and bitterness that things aren't better ...I choose love positivity and gratitude that things aren't worse.
To choose love and jump in not knowing, with a lot of unknowns, is a brave act.
Do not forget duty. But choose love when you can.
If everyone chose love, this world would be magnificent. Always choose love.
All your life, you will be faced with a choice. You can choose love or hate…I choose love.
I believe that every single event in life happens in an opportunity to choose love over fear.

The people who inspire me most are those who are willing to see the world from a loving perspective. People who perceive obstacles as opportunities and problems as spiritual assignments. People who choose love.

It matters whether you see yourself as someone who is capable of effecting change or whether you see yourself as someone whose voice does not count. It matters whether you treat yourself with reverence or with carelessness. Every bit of work you do on yourself matters. Every time you choose love, it matters.
